channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Spring Security OAuth
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Spring Security OAuth

item.title: CVE-2016-4977|2024-08-06T00:46:39.945Z -- pivotal -- spring%20security%20oauth
item.description: When processing authorization requests using the whitelabel views in Spring Security OAuth 2.0.0 to 2.0.9 and 1.0.0 to 1.0.5, the response_type parameter value was executed as Spring SpEL which enabled a malicious user to trigger remote code execution via the crafting of the value for response_type.
